sentences.en: A clause within a contract or deed for annulment.
sentences.cn: 土地管理及执行契约条款.

sentences.en: And one day you just come home and start throwing words around like annulment.
sentences.cn: 然后有一天你一回家,就开始围绕无效婚姻开始大放厥词.

sentences.en: Continued absence of one party may also justify annulment.
sentences.cn: 一方经常不在也可以成为宣告婚姻无效的理由.

sentences.en: Getting married on a dare is grounds for an annulment.
sentences.cn: 被激后结婚可做为婚姻无效的理由.

sentences.en: He may appeal to the Pope for an annulment of his 24-year marriage.
sentences.cn: 他可能会请求主教宣告他那长达24年的婚姻无效。

sentences.en: Law An annulment acquittal ; dismissal, of a court order.
sentences.cn: 取消, 宣告无罪; 法院命令的撤销.

sentences.en: Law An annulment or acquittal; dismissal, as of a court order.
sentences.cn: 撤消,宣告无罪; 法院命令的撤销.

sentences.en: The annulment of their marriage resulted in the bastardization of their children.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻被判无效,使他们的孩子成了私生子.

sentences.en: The judge, said Segolene Royal, the former Socialist presidential candidate, would never have agreed to the annulment had a case about false virginity been brought by a woman.
sentences.cn: 法官表示，假如关于谎称童贞的诉讼是由女方提出，社会党前任总统候选人贺雅尔(Segolene Royal)一定不会同意取消婚姻关系。

sentences.en: The limits of authority for approving the annulment of a reserve rank shall be the same as those for approving the conferment of the rank.
sentences.cn: 批准取消预备役军官军衔的权限，与批准授予该级预备役军官军衔的权限相同。

sentences.en: The same applies to any changes or annulment.
Therefore, there is no possibility of an annulment taking place , " he added. "
sentences.cn: 因此, 不存在取消 大选 结果的可能.

trans.tran_cn: 废除，取消，（法院对婚姻等）判决无效
